9 @import Foundation;
10 
11 #ifdef LUMBERJACK
12 
13 #define LOG_LEVEL_DEF ddLogLevel
14 #import <CocoaLumberjack/CocoaLumberjack.h>
15 
16 #else /* LUMBERJACK */
17 
18 typedef NS_OPTIONS(NSUInteger, DDLogFlag){
22  DDLogFlagError = (1 << 0),
23 
27  DDLogFlagWarning = (1 << 1),
28 
32  DDLogFlagInfo = (1 << 2),
33 
37  DDLogFlagDebug = (1 << 3),
38 
42  DDLogFlagVerbose = (1 << 4)
43 };
44 
45 
46 typedef NS_ENUM(NSUInteger, DDLogLevel){
47 DDLogLevelOff = 0,
48 
52 DDLogLevelError = (DDLogFlagError),
53 
57 DDLogLevelWarning = (DDLogLevelError | DDLogFlagWarning),
58 
62 DDLogLevelInfo = (DDLogLevelWarning | DDLogFlagInfo),
63 
67 DDLogLevelDebug = (DDLogLevelInfo | DDLogFlagDebug),
68 
72 DDLogLevelVerbose = (DDLogLevelDebug | DDLogFlagVerbose),
73 
77 DDLogLevelAll = NSUIntegerMax
78 };
79 
80 #ifdef DEBUG
81 
82 #define DDLogVerbose if (ddLogLevel & DDLogFlagVerbose) NSLog
83 #define DDLogDebug if (ddLogLevel & DDLogFlagDebug) NSLog
84 #define DDLogWarn if (ddLogLevel & DDLogFlagWarning) NSLog
85 #define DDLogInfo if (ddLogLevel & DDLogFlagInfo) NSLog
86 #define DDLogError if (ddLogLevel & DDLogFlagError) NSLog
87 
88 #else
89 
90 #define DDLogVerbose(...)
91 #define DDLogDebug(...)
92 #define DDLogWarn(...)
93 #define DDLogInfo(...)
94 #define DDLogError(...)
95 
96 #endif /* DEBUG */
97 #endif /* LUMBERJACK */
98 
99 extern DDLogLevel ddLogLevel;
